title: websportio
author: websportio
content: Hello Everyone,Websport.io is a decentralized sports betting platform. The project is under continuous development by our team. Features of the platform:1- Our difference from other websites is that we support many countries and subtitles.2- Higher rates.3- Deposit and withdraw BNB with Binance Smart Chain.4- Football and Basketball bets.5- Football live betting.Roadmaps:1- BSC - USDT and BUSD will be added.2- More than one blockchain will be added.3- Basketball live betting.4- Tennis pre-match.We plan to finish it Q3.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: websportio on July 24, 2023, 03:19:44 PM1- Our difference from other websites is that we support many countries and subtitles.2- Higher rates.3- Deposit and withdraw BNB with Binance Smart Chain.4- Football and Basketball bets.5- Football live betting.I don’t see this feature as an advantage to other platform especially the popular sportsbook here. This feature is very common and inferior to the current sportsbook available on the market. You have a very limited sports market offered and few cryptocurrencies accepted to your platform. I’m not trying to degrade your casino but the feature that you mention makes no difference at all when compared to other sportsbook.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: websportio on July 24, 2023, 03:19:44 PMWebsport.io is a decentralized sports betting platform.Why do you call your project decentralized if you have all the control under the project to the point that you can cancel the bets and avoid paying the users as we can see in point 4 of your Terms and Conditions:Quote4. If you violate the T&C we have the right to refuse partially or completely (at our discretion) to conduct any transaction that you request.And the bankroll should run from your side, that's why your project is fully centralized, but I would like to understand why you called a decentralized project, can you explain that to the community?And why there is a limit to betting based on the users' total bets? that's kind of nonsense. You are limiting the high rollers this way.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: The website look very simple and asked me to connect my wallet,  this is something that I am not used to and as that I have my reservations in connecting my wallet,  but I am aware that most of the web3 gambling platform this day that claims decentralization but centralized in their operations since connecting your wallet gives the platform total control of the fund in the wallet and if you by mistake connect to a scam platform,  you risk losing all your balance along the line. To ops,  let me welcome you to the forum,  even though you have failed in many ways but all are correctable,  and you can first start by purchasing a copper member account which will give you a lot of advantages.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Any chances you can drop your ToS in advance so we can actually believe this "Decentralized" claim of yours? Well it is understandable so I can give the benefit of the doubt but still, we'd like to see some proof its a DEX before anything else since that's the key feature of your casino after all.In terms of features, too little sports variety to even call it sports betting. Your roadmap shouldn't even include it, it should be the key idea of what your site should've had first and foremost. I know football and basketball are famous sports, but as you claim that you support many countries, having as many sports as possible would increase your possible user count imo.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I think people are misunderstanding DEX term here, what op meant is 1) The site uses decentralized login system 2) When you deposit funds, instead of being held by a particular entity, they are held in smart contracts which can be interacted even if the front-end goes down and these contracts will last as long as base chain will last (here in case, BSC) unlike in traditional casino where you are at complete mercy of casino. Although, security of smart contract still needs to verified, hopefully devs will publish audit from reputable firm.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: 1.Why don't you finish your website and make it fully functional before posting an announcement thread?2.Why don't you make a proper announcement thread? Your thread doesn't even have a live link to your website. This looks suspicious and I don't want to visit your website by typing the domain name in the browser bar.I have never seen a successful fully decentralized sports betting platform. Many forum members(including me) have doubts that your sportsbook will be truly decentralized. I have never used the Binance smart chain before and I know nothing about it. Isn't the Binance smart chain actually centralized? Doesn't Binance have full control over the Binance smart chain?Anyway, good luck with this project, OP.

comments.author: Distinctin
comments.body: DEX sports betting hasn't been that much of a game-changer based on my observation. I think there are some DEX sports betting sites already, but they cannot compete with the centralized sports betting sites as they provide bigger limits and plenty of bonuses. I'm not underestimating your project, but if you can deliver something new that could attract viewers, then I guess you have a chance to succeed.Please consider this thread as your official thread, and don't forget to provide us with an update on the ongoing development. Hopefully, you'll be able to launch the project as expected.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: I'm sorry, but what do you mean DEX sports betting? Is your sports betting website also a cryptocurrency exchange? Because DEX stands for Decentralized EXchange. Do you have any kind of control over your users funds and/or winnings? If you have full control over payouts then that alone makes it centralized. In such a case you cannot claim your betting platform to be decentralized.Furthermore, you should provide your gambling platform as open source. The website itself looks very simple, as if you put in an entire 10 minutes worth of work into building it. I cannot trust connecting my wallet because there are too many red flags.
